name: Lost:Nomad
description:
Lost:Nomad

This is a fast paced puzzle platfomer designed to push the player to move as fast as possible. We have a grapple gun that is the main mode for travel through our 2 levels (further levels in development). 

The gun also has the ability to "switch realms" switching some platforms from intangible to tangible. When they are intangible you can not stand on them.

In this game you have crashed landed on a foreign 'Planet X' and realize you must move quickly if you plan on getting off alive.
